website_summaries.verdict: Exceptional power for the price, but it really stands out for its super lightweight design.
pros: At only 8.8 lbs, it's one of the lightest vacuums on the market
Large dust canister (2 liters), 8-foot hose, and washable filters make this feel like a more expensive vacuum for a great price
cons: Prone to overheating, but it seems to only be a problem when used for extended periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daaang. I used my old vacuum first, then used this vacuum right after for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sean

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. Holy cow. It’s cheap (and compact and swivels) but it sure does get the job done. I vacuumed a hallway runner and it looked brand new after that. I vacuumed my bedroom and my living room and the amount of pet hair it picked up was almost disgusting. If you want a powerful vacuum at a cheap price then you will have just that, if you buy this vacuum. It is also bagless, which I love! You have to buy this thing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst vaccum I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Worst vaccum I've ever owned. I've had nothing but problems with it. And it doesn't work on hard floors. It's constantly shutting off. My old vaccum did that when it got hot but it took awhile this one does it shortly after I've been using it. I would like to vaccum my house all at once not one room wait an hour and do the next.
customer_reviews.author: Kyndra

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for the price!! Swivel motion is a plus, lugging it around is a minus
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! Works wonderfully, picks up beautifully pet dander and dust! Love the swivel motion, wish it was self-propelled though. Takes a bit of effort to maneuver around the house, and it is a bit heavy for such a small vacuum, but it does the trick!! Would buy again, also, it comes with an extra belt with the instructions, which is a big plus for my household, as breaking the belt is a regular occurence in my household.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: but it has wonderful suction. For the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit loud, but it has wonderful suction. For the price, I'm surprised! I'm so happy I got this vacuum. I have two cats and they shed a lot. Not having to worry about their fur everywhere is great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTeacher

customer_reviews.title: No good for a home with pets!
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight and I love the swivel movement. The filter and waste receptacle are super easy to clean. Great suction power. Now the bad news. It absolutely is not for a home with pets, even though it’s a “pet vacuum.” Fine fur totally clogs this up. We have to unhook all hoses and manually remove fur from hoses and top of waste receptacle at least twice to vacuum one room. Worse news. I have been trying to get Black & Decker to respond and I am getting no where. They asked for a copy of my Amazon invoice and have not communicated since I sent this.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vacuum originally on a Black Friday deal from the previous year but unfortunately our family dog had chewed the power cord to it recently and we had to retire it early. I looked at stores everywhere for the same exact model because I was so pleased at how lightweight it was and it had always done an amazing job cleaning our carpet and tile floors. It's amazing how much pet hair and dust it finds even when you think your house is clean! I'm so glad to have it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Only works sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in February, have only used it a handful of times. Here we are 2 months later and it just randomly shuts off in the middle of vacuuming. It turns back on after a while so I'm assuming it is overheating. Which i don't understand because it's barely been used and i only have a small apartment but less than 5 mins into vacuuming it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: What a hunk of junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, ineffective and absurd to clean! You would be better served if you used a drinking straw to suck clean your carpet- this device is so underpowered and cheap it can't even pick-up a down feather off a carpet. It is ridiculously difficult to empty as the powdery debris gets everywhere. Also, you need to wash the filter and the canister which is filthy and makes more of a mess than the vacuum cleans. Spare yourself the misery, bite the bullet + purchase a real vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Rob_D_Craig

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 months in and we've replaced parts and more parts and it only works when it wants to. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Graves

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid Black+Decker meant quality, that's no longer the case everything I've bought from them has broken (three products weed whacker, mower,and this vacuum). Don't waste your time or money on any of their products. They make it last long enough so you can't return it. Since most reviews happen within the first few days when it's still working it's misleading. It doesn't even seal right anymore. Save yourself and run away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight Vac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little vacuum after my son ordered one and raved about it. I needed a smaller lightweight vaccum i could easily lift and use without sufferring a back ache every time i cleaned. Much more than i expected. It seems a bit cheap, it is extremely light and small but has much more power than larger more expensive cleaners. The head is small and swevels so easily cleans ecges corners and underneath things. I was shocked at how much dust and dirt i got after vaccuming my caroet i thought was ‘clean’....now after several vaccums thhe carpet is cleaner and my trassh cannister shows it. A good buy for tthe price.
customer_reviews.author: BFAV

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Chord / Lost Suction
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum lost suction after 3 uses. I had to take the entire thing apart and clean it in order for it to start working even half as well as it did out of the box. In Addition to that, the chord is super flimsy for a vacuum. I rolled over it one time by accident with the vacuum and the vacuum stopped working. I know you're supposed to avoid that but, it happens sometimes. But that should not render the vacuum useless. Spend a little more money for a sturdier vacuum. The suction is FANTASTIC right out of the box though.
customer_reviews.author: Aadeos

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have pets!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat and the cat hair is EVERYWHERE!!!! This vacuum is really great for getting all the hair. Easy to clean by emptying the removable cup. Easy to clean the unit itself. One issue that turned out to have a very easy solution was that the vacuum stopped sucking due to a clog that I couldn't find, but after calling the Black & Decker phone number I was instructed on how to fix the problem and it worked. The vacuum is as good as when I first bought it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: But the pet tool does not perform so great on sofas to grab the hair or particles and ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not have an option to change the vacuuming from bare floors to carpet. Took it as they said it was light weight and has the pet tool. But the pet tool does not perform so great on sofas to grab the hair or particles and it doesnt feel light weight. The wheels dont let it move very easily and also changing from vacuuming to standing position is kind of hard, it makes a big sound most of the times that I try to put it back to standing position and scares me like its broken
customer_reviews.author: Suresh Bollina

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 thinking the first one was just a fluke. Well, it wasn't. The second one doesn't pick up any more dust, dirt and animal hair than the first one did. I do the entire living room and there's nothing in the canister. I won't bother asking for a refund, I'll just sit it out on the corner so some other fool can use it and be as disappointed as I was. Next time, I get a real vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months. Not long lasting vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I got this vacuum less than a year ago. It stopped working properly after about 3 months and when I attempted to return through amazon, it said the order was too old. I purchased the protection plan, so I'm not sure why I'm unable to have it refunded, or at least replaced/ repaired. I would suggest spending a little more money to get a vacuum that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got a refurbished and it was great for the two weeks that it worked, and then it quit sucking up anything the main attachment that I got it for was for pet hair on my furniture it completely fell apart, I attempted to use a different attachment and when it sucked the itema up into the hose it would just spit it back out onto the floor after doing so, lesson learned I'll just buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum, it has the most awesome suction of any vacuum I've ever owned. I really couldn't believe the amount of crap that came out of my carpet - makes me want to get new carpet LoL! Really, this is a great vacuum & worth every penny spent. Tip: if the suction doesn't seem as powerful, it's time to clean out the filters 😄 if I had any complaint at all, it would be to make the hose a bit longer or provide a hose extension attachment.
customer_reviews.author: JLynn

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is light weight. I would not waste your money though, the rubber came off of of both the the smaller wheels...I used it twice. It's now hard to move around and pretty much a waste of money. Do yourself a favor and just buy a 20 dollar vaccum from walmart, it will also fall apart but you will have wasted less money.
customer_reviews.author: Fa1ce0721

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended in a pet magazine. Bought it and love it. It has very strong sucktion - sucks up ll that hidden dirt and fur. I was amazed at how much dirt was in my rug. It is easily manuverable and lightweight. The cord is long enough to not have to keep repluging. It was easy to assemble, too. The bagless dust cup holds a lot and is easy to empty; the filters re easy to remove for cleaning. Definitely should be on every pet owner's list.
customer_reviews.author: Sally R.

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I had a vacuum cleaner that was really sturdy but it was like wrestling a bear to actually vaccuum the floor. It was heavy, impossible to maneuver and vacuuming was a nightmare. I just received this cleaner yesterday but it was easy to put together and it sucked up the dirt in two of my rooms in no time at all. It maneuvers really easily and the suction power is great. I don't yet know how durable it is. It is really light weight and that worries me a bit but--if it lasts a year, it will be worth this price. So far, I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very very disappointed and upset with this vacuum. It worked very very good for a month. After that it's stopped having any suction at all and if it did have some suction temporarily it clogged up constantly! that's very disappointing because when it did work it had great section power the tools were good it was really lightweight it was definitely a little powerhouse when it worked and I was pleased. So I only got one month's use out of it and only used it a handful of times. I wasn't able to return it or get a free one or have them send me a new one. I won't be buying this brand again based on that.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have seriously never used a vacuum cleaner that cleaned my house this well! I am amazed! If you want a vacuum cleaner that is easy to use, lightweight, has amazing maneuvering ability, this is the one! I will definitely buy another one! I searched for a long time and have used multiple brands! This one has been the very best! The best part is it’s very much affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold up...
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a cheap-o vac, knowing that it might only last a year or so. What I didn't expect was for it to go tits up in 3 months. I live in a small apartment, just me, one cat, no kids, vacuum once a week. At first I was super impressed, it worked great, suction was awesome, easy to empty and clean and replace filters...but one afternoon it just decided to be a crappy vacuum. Nothing wrong with it as far as I can tell. Hoses aren't clogged, spinner still spins...filters changed and good to go...just literally started to...Suck...by NOT sucking.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nonny Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is affordable, but unfortunately isn’t great for picking up pet (or human) hair. It worked fine for the first couple months of weekly use, but got clogged very easily. The rotating brush inside stopped turning, likely because some hair tangled it up somehow, and there isn’t an efficient way to untangle it without doing some unscrewing. If you have a lot of hair to pick up, I recommend spending the extra money for a higher quality vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Asher Walker

customer_reviews.title: Ok considering the price but not a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This works ok but I'm not impressed. The way you lower the handle to vacuum is ackward. It's not an actual button type thing you press your foot on. It's kind of in indentation in the molding at the bottom. Have to have your foot in just the right spot and press hard. There is no place on the vacuum to mount the hand held rotator brush. If this wasn't a vacuum I bought to keep upstairs to vacuum the bedrooms weekly, I would have returned it. Do not buy if this is the vacuum you will use for the main floor of your home a few times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Product defective on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Used once, will never use again. Suction power was great however the bristles didn't spin and the hose is incredibly short. This made it difficult to push the vacuum cleaner forward and I definitely could not reach anything on the ceiling. I called Amazon to try and figure out the problem. Since the vacuum was only sold by third party sellers, Amazon refunded me without needing to return the item, which helped a lot because once you assemble this vacuum cleaner it seems impossible to disassemble again. 1 star for the product itself. 5 stars for Amazon's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: VVu

customer_reviews.title: never knew my floors were so dirty
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a youtube video and amazon reviews before making this purchase. This vacuum is incredible!!! I never knew my floors were so dirty until now. I was using a hoover. I will never go back. Black and Decker you win. Your product is great! I put it together turned it on began cleaning and the suction was amazing. It pulled dirt out of my carpet I never knew existed. Probably great for allergies and asthma too. It is easy to put together, very light weight, isn't to loud and easy to empty the container and clean the filter. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: chuck lane

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad vacuum but it's not a great one either. For the price, it will clean the surface that you need but it will not deeply clean the carpets. The one attachment it comes with isn't very good or that functional. If you're looking for a vacuum that will last a long time and work great, I would recommend a different one. But if, like me, you just need a vacuum that will do an alright job for less than $100 (because money is a little tight) and don't plan to have it for more than 6 months, this is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Softball Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best vac ever
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 5 by 7 rugs. I have a dog and cats, my other vac was not getting the hair up very well. I didn't want to spend much for the 2 rugs. WOW! This vac has the best suction!!! I could not believe how much it picked up out of 1 rug. I filled the canister. The cord is plenty long. The hose could of been longer, the suction is so strong it is hard to use the hose. I've spent a lot of money on other vacs that didn't do half of what this one does. It's easy with the swivel. This was money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Valarie T. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for the price! Nice deal for a decent vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of embarrassing to admit, but this is the first "real" vacuum that I have ever purchased. Previously, I bought stick vacuums such as the dirt devil. This works like a real vacuum (quite powerful/not too loud) , and is small enough to fit into my apartment coat closet. The cord is long enough so that I only need to unplug it once to vacuum my entire place. Emptying out the dirt bin is easy, and it maneuvers around well to get under chairs and my sofa (low profile). I like it! Good purchase / I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: workoutfreak

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, clean floors  ;)
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum so far is pretty good. I had problems attaching the handle when I first got it. It was extremely tight putting it in the slots, and I ended up having to take my knife and shave it down so it would fit. But other than that it has cleaned my carpets well(as you can see in the picture). It definitely cleans better than my other vacuum, but it’s kinda hard to push and pull on medium carpets. Guess it’s cause it’s really digging deep and sucking up all that debris in the carpet. It comes with a replacement drive belt, so that’s a good deal. Anyways it’s a good vacuum for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R Butcher

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's got great suction
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally do reviews but I thought this item really deserves one. It's lightweight so you can pick it up to wrap the cord up rather than have to bend over. I love it. It's got great suction! The little pieces of junk sitting right in the crevice between the floor and baseboard won't stay there long with this little vacuum. It's the perfect vacuum for a small house or apartment. One thing I neglected to mention is that it doesn't have a height adjustment to go from floor to carpet. Could be a challenge for some carpet types.
customer_reviews.author: corps0331

customer_reviews.title: Did not even get to use
customer_reviews.text: Did not even get to use this vacuum because the package came without all the parts required for assembly. The dirt canister will not stay on because it is missing a screw that was not in the box. There were no holes in the box or anything so they just did not include it on packaging. Luckily my husband has screws and can fix it but it would have been nice if all the necessary parts were included in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Belt broke within one hour of taking it out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Just took this vacuum out of the box 10/5/19. Put it together. Vacuumed the living room, then most of one bedroom. Was working well, lightweight, good suction. Then there was a burning smell & the roller stopped turning. Going to take it apart, guessing it's the belt, will update review when I know. But really? I used it less than ONE HOUR & it broke? Don't get me wrong, I wasn't expecting the performance of a $500, I understand I purchased a lightweight, inexpensive vacuum. But I thought it would last longer than an hour without requiring service. Very disappointed, but now I see why they included a free belt in the box.
customer_reviews.author: T in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten this a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: This thing does an incredible job of picking up pet fur. I have a bunch of critters and I had previously been using one of the mini shopvacs and it wasn't doing much of anything for me despite being well maintained. I had to empty this out 8 or 9 times just doing one pass of my house. That's not a complaint about the capacity (it's very lightweight and I bet in the future I will only have to empty it a couple times), it's a testament to how well this vacuum performs.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: The vaccum arrrived as scheudled. While it seems to works good for a smaller vacuccum for the price there was no skrew to attach the handle which makes it difficult to use. If is frustrating to buy a product that does not have all the parts. We will have to go find a skrew that fits and see how it works. I don't feel like I shou have to now go out and seach for the part which should have come in the box.. I am Frustrated!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Olden

customer_reviews.title: Black & Decker doesn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, easy to maneuve. We just moved in and after 2 weeks without a vacuum our floors and carpet looked nasty. I vacuumed once and emptied the canister surprised by how full it was, being brand new carpeting. I vacuumed a 2nd time just to test it to see how much I missed. Canister had barely anything inside other than stray carpet fibers and a little dust. Amazing machine for the price, I paid $46 delivered. We own several other Black & Decker products that are still going strong. Very happy so far and will continue to update if I think it's helpful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Larocque

customer_reviews.title: Little things come in big packages
customer_reviews.text: I was smitten by this tiny vacuum after I assembled it. It is about 12 inches wide at base. It weighs about 8.5 lbs. No bag needed. I could not find a place to put the pet attachment so stacked it on top of brush tool. Just big enough to do first floor area rugs and floors. Press your foot on upper left corner to engage handle maneuver. Very nice for the price, Frosted white and red. Assembly had a hard time getting handle to lock in but finally...
customer_reviews.author: tootiej

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I have bought it a couple of months ago, and I have not found any downsides yet. It is super powerful, light weight, easy to clean and excellent to clean the entire home. I have a rather small place, and this is perfect to clean anything from the bedroom carpet to the hardwood floors in the living room!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Circella

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum for the price! It is a bit smaller than I expected, but it worked out for me because I needed something small and lightweight. It was easy to put together, which was very important to me. The maneuverability is great. The suction is excellent. I can't believe how much dirt and dust this picked up after the vacuum this replaced! I haven't used the pet tool accessory yet, but I have confidence that it will work just as great as the rest of it. Overall I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little vacuum! I was done lugging around my heavy Bissell! I was so excited to use this so I did some vacuuming yesterday after it arrived. I could not believe how much dirt there was in the cannister! And that was only one room! Note: I just vacuumed the day before with my Bissell. Shocking! I am going to love vacuuming! It's the perfect size, light and easy to maneuver! Love it! And the cost was so affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a small apartment and did not think I needed a big vacuum. This one was not strong enough and on the second time I used the vacuum it smelled bad. It was like an over heating vacuum smell. Soon as I started to use it the second time. I did clean the vacuum out very good before second use. It did not help out that I did that. It just seems like if you have more then a hall way to vacuum with this vacuum it will not do much more then that.
customer_reviews.author: Marie K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality vacuum for low price
customer_reviews.text: I live with pets and carpet which isnt the greatest mix but we only have small areas of carpet so I hated having a huge vacuum. They're so heavy and hard to store and unnecessary. Found this one on sale and as soon as it got here, was so excited with how easy it was to assemble. Its incredibly lightweight and compact. I absolutely love that you can take the filter compartment out and it has a little door that stays closed until you have it over the trash can so it doesn't spill everywhere. Over all, would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Got my black & decker air swivel vacuum today & immediately attached the handle & tried it out & let me tell ya, it is the BEST little ultra light vac I have ever used! It pulled more pet hair, dirt & dust out of my carpets than I even care to admit was there & my 7 year old living room carpet looks like new again! Thank you black & decker for such a great bang for my buck! 100% + satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  No carpet/floor height adjustment
customer_reviews.text: First off, I just received this today. They did not include the screw to attach the handle to the base. Luckily, I managed to find one. And you had to fiddle with it so the dirt cup would stay locked in place. Secondly, works well on bare floors, but with carpet, you have to struggle. My large Eureka that I had was a lot easier to maneuver on carpet. I have back problems and felt like I had to fight with this thing. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: bcolliemom

customer_reviews.title: Good lord this was a bit of a pain in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good lord this was a bit of a pain in the butt to get the handle on...The suction is good thus far BUT...I hate where the release is for the emptying of the canister..I hate that the power cord will not stay put in the little power code clip on the handle, I hate that there isn't more hose for when I'm trying to vacuum air return vents and tops of windows and hard to reach places....thinking of returning..but what a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Cundiff

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This machine is in incredible! I never had so much vacuum power. I was embarrassed to see how poorly my former vacuum cleaned. A carpet that was cleaned and vacuumed every week couldn't be that dirty! But the proof was in the cup. OMG! Didn't know Black and Decker made a vacuum but like everything else they make it is great. Light weight for us "older folks" with cleaning power that is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kisting

customer_reviews.title: Such a good vacuum and it’s not crazy expensive!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has worked great, I’m so impressed with how much dirt it continues to pick up. I’m always vacuuming up dirt and grass my son seems to find ways to track inside. It’s so lightweight it moves around so easily and the suction on this vacuum is incredible I love to vacuum now because it gets my carpets so clean. I’m overall very impressed with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: DebSd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price, but has some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Most of my house is hard floors, so I just needed something for large area rugs. This unit is very lightweight and easy to clean. However, it doesn't like to stand up by itself and I have to lean it on a wall when I'm not holding it. I have cats and a dog, and it does a pretty good job with pet hair. However, it doesn't like larger objects (like pieces of gravel from an aquarium.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Powerful, and Easy to Maneuver!
customer_reviews.text: So far, So good! I have only used this a couple of times, so if things change I will update the review, but this vacuum is perfect for the price. I love the swivel feature and how easy it is to get into every corner. This vacuum pulled up a shocking amount of dirt and hair from my carpet that my old (now retired) vacuum had been missing. It is also incredibly light weight and was easy to put together. I don't think you can find a better deal for a vacuum. Give it a go!
customer_reviews.author: Creehatch

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I have 1 dog and 3 cats. The pet hair and mess in general is obnoxious. This works really well. My carpet didn't even look as dirty as it seemed to be after looking at what was vacuumed. Update: Bought this on July 27 and its November 29. The vacuum worked really well in the beginning, now it barely sucks up anything and makes a loud whistling noise, not sure where its coming from. Very disappointed that it hasn't even been 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia P

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't withstand a year.
customer_reviews.text: After exactly one year. Wheels aren't held on very well. Both broke off. Cord has a short. Started smoking 2 days after one year purchase. Suction power was ok. Hose broke and started to unravel. Regular house hold use.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Dust Cup Pops Out Repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Amazon review. And the second time I ordered this vacuum cleaner. Not because I'm impressed. The first one was defective; the dust cup popped out, on its own, whenever I returned the vacuum to an upright position. I swapped it for a new vacuum. However the second one has the same issue. I'd like to say you get what you pay for, but this vacuum is proving to be frustratingly unwieldy, with the vacuum cup repeatedly popping out of its locked (clicked) position - unfortunate, as this model boasts a strong suction, a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Berg

customer_reviews.title: Not real happy with this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Not real thrilled with this product. The tubing keeps coming out of a connection, the cord won't stay on the little hook on the top, it's already clogged several times, it does not maneuver while on regular carpet I have to push pretty hard. It is not adjustable up or down so larger pieces of cereal or anything similar will not be sucked up by it because there's not enough space.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum overall. The plastic doesn't feel overly sturdy which is my main concern for lastability. It's a little smaller than a full size vacuum which I like for my living situation and yet it still has the detachable hose like a larger vacuum. The suction is very strong almost to the point where it takes effort to push the vacuum which is where I notice the quality of the plastic being questionable long term. For the price and my needs, I am satisfied overall. If you're looking for something very sturdy, this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today and vacuumed my down stairs. The suction is great and I like the handle being able to move from side to side. The down part is that this vacuum does not do well on carpet. I have berber carpet and it took a good push to get it to move. The other thing I had an issue with is that the cord holder is useless. After about four or five pushes it comes off. I would say this is a good vacuum if you only have hardwood or tile flooring. I would only recommend this vacuum if its all you can afford, if not save your money and but a dyson or kirby.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Alaniz

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Vacuum..
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. It is smaller than I expected but does a great job. The suction is very powerful and exactly what I wanted. The downside to the great suction is how hard it can be to maneuver. I found it hard to push and pull across my carpet. I can see this being an issue for someone who may have weak wrists and little body strength. I would, however, recommend this product to anyone who has pets. It picks up so well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive vacuum was surprisingly great. It's not just good for a cheap vacuum, it's actually a good vacuum period. The only slight issue is that it is a little harder to maneuver, it doesn't self propel, and it you're on a slightly thicker carpet it will be very difficult to move it. The suction is powerful and it's easy to clean out the tank. It also comes with all the accessories I need.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: The number one amazing feature on this vacuum is the maneuverability. This vacuum can bend into any groove and makes it a lot easier to clean without putting all of the furniture up. It works well on cat hair, but sometimes needs an additional "go-over" to pick everything up. Vacuuming my 1 bedroom apartment (carpet throughout) fills up the whole chamber, though, but it's easy enough to clean. Can get a bit messy cleaning out the chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Tina T

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and cleaning power but really hard to use on carpet and with the extension hose.  Not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has great suction so it does clean. It is just really poorly constructed, so badly that it is hard to use. The cord is attached to the back of the vacuum right where you are most likely to step on it during use. The hose and attachments are so short you cannot clean cobwebs off your ceiling...and I’m relatively tall and have low ceilings! Even if you just want to clean baseboards, the vacuum tips over if you use the hose. I don’t think it will work on stairs at all. It is hard to push on dense rugs, a challenge on wall to wall carpet, but maneuverable on wood and tile.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly k

customer_reviews.title: Powerful cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The cord length allows me to move freely throughout the areas of my house with carpeting, but what's best is the suction and therefore the cleaning capacity is way beyond my expectations. I had vacuumed my downstairs carpets prior to trying this new vacuum and I was amazed at how much dust and dog dander it was able to remove from the carpets. The clear canister makes it easy to keep track of how full it is and is easy to empty. You have to put the handle on after it arrives, but that took about 5 minutes before it was ready to go to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Farlin

customer_reviews.title: Lot of vacuum cleaner for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for finally a "decent" lower cost basic vacuum cleaner. Well, this is it! Simple to assemble. One screw. The hose connections make sense. The dust container goes on and off easily and is intuitive. I was vacuuming 15 minutes after the mailman dropped this off. Suction is off the charts for the price paid. The swivel head works well and feels very natural. Cord length is right. Hard to believe this was $50. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: timmyj3

customer_reviews.title: Pos! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids. At under 9 lbs they can move this easier then the Dyson. More vacuuming makes a happier life After owning this since May 2019 it is now Aug 2019 and the vacuum has stopped working. Idk what is wrong with it but will not turn on. It was a nice vac while it worked but I need to get at least a year out of a 70 dollar vac. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ya mum

customer_reviews.title: Parts for assembly do not fit.
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a cheap vacuum, but I am very disappointed that the parts to assemble the vacuum do not fit. The plastic is very cheap and flimsy. I miss the days when products were made in the USA with a higher quality control. This is probably the worse of any item I've purchased thus far. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Big yes.
customer_reviews.text: Good ol’ Black and Decker. Still a trustworthy company. This little tornado of a dirt sucker is ‘da bomb’. I live in dust that is like flour. My lifestyle includes horses, dogs, cats and a lot of in and out of the house traffic. I also demand a clean house. Lived in but clean. I hate to clean house and the ‘upkeep as you go’ is the preferred method. So this little dirt sucker fits this household’s needs perfectly. Compact, maneuverability, remarkably good looking, outstanding performance and ease of use. Give the filters and dirt cup a washing out regularly and this machine will be your friend. We named ours Toby.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Barncleaner

customer_reviews.title: NOT for excessive pet hair
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is alright for my situation... I have 2 dogs and 1 of them sheds a ton. The first few times I used this vacuum it was fantastic. But after a few uses it kept getting clogged with hair. Now EVERY time I use it I have to take it apart and clean it. It is very unfortunate because the suction power is awesome... but it clogs so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron/Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Awful awful vacuum! I purchased one in early December and within the week it broke and would not suck anything up. I requested a replacement. The replacement maybe worked a couple weeks and quit working. I would never recommend this vacuum. It was very lightweight, but the loss of suction is a deal breaker. I have returned the replacement vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Leow397

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: We don’t have the best luck with vacuums. I don’t know why. The last one seemed to work okay, but smelled something awful and couldn’t stand it anymore. My wife actually only wanted a small electric broom thing for quick pickups, but this was on sale, so I threw it in the cart as well. It’s light, works well, and is a cinch to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mangetout

customer_reviews.title: Really great vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for a family member and they love it! They've told me several times that their carpet looks so good now and they can see what's coming up. Initially they wanted a bagged vacuum cleaner but after using this one they've changed their minds. Even though the cord has to be wrapped it doesn't matter to them.
customer_reviews.author: KDE

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly though it was two days late and amazon still doesn’t show the item as being delivered. The product worked well for only five months and now it will not turn on, I refuse to deal will the hassle of getting it repaired and dealing with the calls and red tape that accompany it even though the warranty should cover it... the product details say it is a one year warranty while the warranty link takes me to a two year warranty??, I recommend buying a different product rather than this one. I no longer have the box to even consider returning it. I feel like I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Post

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love the pivot and lose the pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: Pivot feature was not a major consideration for purchase but has become a favorite - reaches nooks and crannies they furniture legs often block. The attachment does a great job of getting my dog’s fur, which sheds so much it defies logic that her coat is thick and full always. Especially nice to use on my couch. A steal when Dysons cost 7-8x this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is fine. And for hardwood floors, it's really good. But carpet? The brushes are so low and tight that I have to vaccuum with BOTH ARMS and push it with all my might to get it to move. Also, there's no way to turn off the brush roll, so you can't solve the problem that way. Putting it together was a little bit of challenge--there's no instruction manual and the pieces had to be pushed together wtih a fair degree of force. Not impossible, but it took me 10 minutes to figure out what to do.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It's a $50 vacuum
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, its a $50 vacuum. Do not expect Dyson power and engineering. With that, for a $50 vacuum it is awesome! We use it on hardwood laminate flooring and 3 carpeted bedrooms. Works like a champ! Does everything I need it to and I don't have to make adjustments from laminate to carpet. The attachments are lacking but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The only issue I'm having is the dust ...
customer_reviews.text: So I just got the vacuum yesterday, it's alot smaller then expected. Works great. The only issue I'm having is the dust bucket cup staying clicked in. Seems very loose. Every time I put the vacuum stick upright, the dust bucket pops off..and spills a bit..so idk if that's the way it's suppose to be or what. I'm happy about the product, but dissatisfied in a sense.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherLishous

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little vacuum!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to stay near this price point but just had to get a new vacuum. Oreck was NOT picking up. After using this once, I realize how true that was. Does an amazing job. Was literally about to throw my area rug away and one use of this unit made it look nearly new. It is small so you will have to empty frequently and I wish the canister release was different as your hands get a little dirty during manual release of that latch. Also, mine required quite a bit of pressure during assembly while inserting the handle but the process was easy. Highly recommend this Black and Decker unit. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I've ever used! This baby isn't the toughest of construction, but it sucks like nothing I've ever used. I've had a $2000.00 Kirby, and this vacuum out performs that! I liked it so much, I bought a second one - keep one upstairs and one downstairs. My daughter asked for one when she moves off to college. Easy to put together, lightweight, easy to use, and superior suction.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: DON'T JUDGE IT BY ITS APPEARANCE! JUST TRY IT!
customer_reviews.text: When I first unboxed this item I thought "Oh, look it looks like a child's toy. Like a My First Vacuum or something." I almost didn't assemble it because it was so small and light. Cute, even. No way was this little thing going to work for my household. But, I did put it together and I DID use it to sweep my floors. I had to keep stopping to dump the canister out because this mighty little vacuum was sucking up so much it would keep getting full. And the thing is I WAS HAVING FUN. This little vacuum is so effective, so gratifying, so light and agile and easy to use. I. LOVE. IT.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph locke

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.  Very light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Works good on the carpets and hardwood floors. Seems to have power. Especially for the light weight. But not so much power when using the hand tools. Also, it doesn’t come with an extender. So the hand tool is short. Hard to use in areas you need the extra length. Also no place to hold the pet hair cleaner attachment that is included. Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: A Fam of Smart Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Gets Clogged Easily
customer_reviews.text: At first this vacuum did an OK job. Unfortunately, after a few weeks, it started being clogged consistently. Now, it hardly works at all and it's been less than 3 months. I wish we could return for a refund. It's not worth $60 for a product that works less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Paradis

customer_reviews.title: I never thought I’d be so happy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum!!!!! I live in a one bed apartment with my husband and cat, it’s a fairly small apartment but there is plenty of carpet and shedding from my cat. I can cover the entire apartment in detail without having to empty the canister. I love the attachments that come with, especially the pet care one.
customer_reviews.author: Amber King

customer_reviews.title: Try it ! You'll like it !
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very impressed by this little vacuum. For the price, we didn't expect a lot out of it. We just wanted most of the pet hair and daily dirt particles to be sucked up. The hope of building a long lasting, close relationship with Black and Decker's lightweight, affordable vacuum wasn't even on our radar....BUT...we're in love! Doesn't take much to make us happy,does it? Great vacuum, Black and Decker! Thanks for the listing, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: yarnlover

customer_reviews.title: Best. Purchase. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is AMAZING. I have almost all vinyl so previously just had a cheap lightweight rechargeable vacuum but I could tell it wasn’t picking up the cat hair off of my rug. I decided to go ahead and purchase this now that I have a newborn and don’t want car hair everywhere. It works wonders. I just had my rug cleaned one week ago and this almost completely filled the dust cup with just one run through of the rug. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: celeste

customer_reviews.title: Works but...
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of the box..setup is easy..the thing sucked well...the problem I have is that there’s no adjustments for carpet type or height...so it vacuumed my carpet great but when I get to my shaggy area rugs we have a problem (see video). I assume if you have shaggy carpet through your house this may not be a good fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: feenoh

customer_reviews.title: Good product does the job
customer_reviews.text: Needed An upstairs lightweight vacuum. This was just the right weight and good suction. My car gets hair every where but we have Berber carpet and it’s hard to see. After 5 minutes of vacuuming the canister was full. Wow. I couldn’t believe how much hair etc had bitten stuck in the carpet. I use it at least twice a week. Keeps my allergies to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Dryve

customer_reviews.title: Great but not suitable for shag carpets or rugs.
customer_reviews.text: Only purchased because it was on sale, and we needed a vacuum asap. This actually works really good, even on bare floors. The suction is awesome. But is near impossible to vacuum our shag rug. Unfortunately I will have to invest into a more expensive vacuum that can work on our shag rug. But I'd definitely recommend this vacuum on regular carpet and non shag rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up very long at all
customer_reviews.text: Initially this sweeper had great suction power and worked great. That lasted for only a few weeks. The canister constantly falls off, the hoses plug really easy and now it won’t pick up anything. I would not recommend this product was a waste of my money. Spend the extra money and get a nice vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum. Great price and my mom is really picky with vacuums and she tried to hate it but it exceeded her expectations (the vacuum was for her). I have purchased cheaper products and they don't work with animal hair. More expensive vacuums might not be practical if an older person is going to be using it and maintaining so this was perfect. That pet hair brush actually works, cleans carpeted steps very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Lei

customer_reviews.title: You get your money’s worth!
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a new vacuum because the old one wasn’t picking up as much trash anymore. Didn’t know where to look so I went on amazon and found this one. It was at a good price and it didn’t seem to have too many bad reviews. When it came it was already assembled which was great. Having used it a handful of times now I can say it’s a very good vacuum. It’s small for the hard to reach areas and also bends at any angle, which is very useful. It’s a good vacuum if you have a small place like I do, I didn’t want something to big or small. The size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I live this vacuum more than my dyspon and room as.
customer_reviews.text: It really picks up the hair! I have three pets and this thing picks up more hair than you would even think is there. Super lightweight. I think it’s a bit difficult to use on the stairs just because there is a cord. I prefer my cordless Dyson for that. My roombas miss spot and keep getting stuck under furniture. This little thing is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Koikindahl

customer_reviews.title: Busted
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed. This worked for a minute and had a strong suction. It would suck up toys like a Cheerio! Which was a problem, bc it was constantly clogged! Then after a few uses it just stopped. It wouldn’t even suck up a crumb. I checked for all possible clogs and each tube was clear. Any HG vacuum suggestions that done cost $300??!!!
customer_reviews.author: Finns mom

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Would Highly recommend! It sucks up all the dirt, hair and dust that lay on your carpet or rug. We've used a Dyson vacuum but I didn't like it at all! I always felt like Dyson wasnt picking up anything. We had a black and decker before the dyson and I loved it but had a friend who broke it so we needed to buy another one. I decided to order the black and decker from Amazon instead of buying it at Walmart like before and it works amazing!! Air swivel picked up all my dogs hair that Dyson couldnt do. I would absolutely recommend black and decker air swivel!
customer_reviews.author: Yaritza

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight and still great suction
customer_reviews.text: A good value for the price. It is very lightweight and still has great suction. The dust cup is a bit tricky to get to lock in place. Black & Decker has a great reputation for durable products and I hope this lives up to their reputation.
customer_reviews.author: aWhysWoman

customer_reviews.title: Mostly for bare floors and thin rugs
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum does NOT have a height adjustment, so it will NOT work on medium to thick carpet. If all you have is bare floors with a few thin rugs, then this should work just fine (although it does seem a bit flimsy - not sure how long it would hold up).
customer_reviews.author: Luckyduck

customer_reviews.title: Horrible For Carpets!
customer_reviews.text: My house is primarily hardwood flooring. However, I do have low piled area carpets. This vacuum is, EXTREMELY, difficult to use on carpets! This vacuum does work, decently, on hardwood floors. However, I was expecting this vacuum to work on carpets -- as stated in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia M

customer_reviews.title: 5+ cats and 2nd time buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 cats, and foster for our local shelter. Needless to say, the cat hair levels in our house can get outrageous. Not to mention the other messes cats tend to make knocking things over and whatnot. This vacuum has withstood so so much! I was shocked when this cheap vacuum lasted 2 full years, so I just bought our second one! The only maintenance I had to do on the first one was replace a belt and deep clean it out every so often. Bundles of hair and shavings from car scratchers tend to sometimes clog the hoses up, but once I pulled out the clog all was back to normal!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  vaccum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister come R who has MS and at times is unable to clean her house the way she wants to. She was so pleased at the light weight and easy to maneuver. It cleaned her carpets tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona M Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Works great on dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: Got this new vacuum and it is WAY better than my previous one. I have 4 dogs and you can see the difference in the amount of hair this thing gets off the floor. Only complaint is that it doesn't have the pull feature that most vacuums have. You have to maually push it the enter time as compared to my old vacuum that pushed forward on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa N Savich

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new apartment and the picture shows how much this thing sucked up in one go. It did seem to not work as well on wood floors as it did on carpet, but it’s also my first use so it could be better next time. The cord is plenty long enough for my one bedroom apartment. I was also able to get under my bed with the vacuum. It does come with a pet tool but there’s nowhere to put it on the vacuum which means I’m eventually going to lose it. I’ll update if there’s any issue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Erika
